languages.text: "Ты близок к разгадке, Ищущий. Запомни слово: "овеществляя". Запомни место: штольня в тени моста, мост в тени великой статуи".
"The answer is close, Seeker. Remember the word: 'realising'. Remember the place: a tunnel in the shadow of a bridge, a bridge in the shadow of the great statue."
languages.original_text: "Ты близок к разгадке, Ищущий. Запомни слово: "овеществляя". Запомни место: штольня в тени моста, мост в тени великой статуи".

traits.locale_text: "The answer is close, Seeker. Remember the word: 'objectifying'. Remember the place: a tunnel shadowed by a bridge, a bridge shadowed by the great statue."

languages.text: “答案已经很接近了，探索者。记住这个词：‘实现’。记住这个地方：桥下阴影中的隧道，巨型雕像影子中的桥。”
languages.original_text: "The answer is close, Seeker. Remember the word: 'realising'. Remember the place: a tunnel in the shadow of a bridge, a bridge in the shadow of the great statue."

traits.locale_text: “答案已经很接近了，探索者。记住这个词：‘实现’。记住这个地方：桥下阴影中的隧道，巨型雕像影子中的桥。”

languages.text: «La respuesta se acerca a ti, que la estás buscando. Recuerda esta palabra: "percatar". Recuerda el lugar: un túnel a la sombra de un puente, un puente a la sombra de la gran estatua».
languages.original_text: "The answer is close, Seeker. Remember the word: 'realising'. Remember the place: a tunnel in the shadow of a bridge, a bridge in the shadow of the great statue."

traits.locale_text: «La respuesta se acerca a ti, que la estás buscando. Recuerda esta palabra: "percatar". Recuerda el lugar: un túnel a la sombra de un puente, un puente a la sombra de la gran estatua».

languages.text: 「答えは近くにある、探究者よ。『気づき』という言葉を忘れるな。『橋の影のトンネル、大像の影の橋』という場所を忘れるな」
languages.original_text: "The answer is close, Seeker. Remember the word: 'realising'. Remember the place: a tunnel in the shadow of a bridge, a bridge in the shadow of the great statue."

traits.locale_text: 「答えは近くにある、探究者よ。『気づき』という言葉を忘れるな。『橋の影のトンネル、大像の影の橋』という場所を忘れるな」

languages.text: "Die Antwort ist nah, Suchender. Denkt an das Wort: 'erkennen.' Denkt an den Ort: ein Tunnel im Schatten einer Brücke, eine Brücke im Schatten der großen Statue."
languages.original_text: "The answer is close, Seeker. Remember the word: 'realising'. Remember the place: a tunnel in the shadow of a bridge, a bridge in the shadow of the great statue."

traits.locale_text: "Die Antwort ist nah, Suchender. Denkt an das Wort: 'erkennen.' Denkt an den Ort: ein Tunnel im Schatten einer Brücke, eine Brücke im Schatten der großen Statue."

languages.text: « La réponse est proche, vous qui cherchez. Retenez ce mot : "réalisation". Et retenez le lieu : un tunnel dans l'ombre d'un pont, un pont dans l'ombre de la grande statue. »
languages.original_text: "The answer is close, Seeker. Remember the word: 'realising'. Remember the place: a tunnel in the shadow of a bridge, a bridge in the shadow of the great statue."

traits.locale_text: « La réponse est proche, vous qui cherchez. Retenez ce mot : "réalisation". Et retenez le lieu : un tunnel dans l'ombre d'un pont, un pont dans l'ombre de la grande statue. »

languages.text: "Ey Arayan, yanıt çok yakında. Şu sözcüğü unutma: "Farkındalık". Mekânı unutma: Büyük heykelin gölgesindeki köprü, o köprünün gölgesindeki tünel."
languages.original_text: "The answer is close, Seeker. Remember the word: 'realising'. Remember the place: a tunnel in the shadow of a bridge, a bridge in the shadow of the great statue."

traits.locale_text: "Ey Arayan, yanıt çok yakında. Şu sözcüğü unutma: "Farkındalık". Mekânı unutma: Büyük heykelin gölgesindeki bir köprü, o köprünün gölgesindeki bir tünel."
